data.message: I've been a core fan since 99', but after you disrespect my President i no longer have any respect for you. It just goes to show that eminem too is a puppet for the liberal propaganda machine.

replies.message: Really? Because it looks more to me like you're a puppet from the republican propaganda machine, but aight

Are you a girl becoming a guy or a guy becoming a girl? Either way you have my support. Live how you want to this is your only life. Im just confused cause you look really fucking weird. Also nice come back! I think im gonna go sit in my safe space and count how many liberal tears have fallen since they lost the election poor wittle babies.
oh woooow I'm so offended at your cliché short hair diss, so classic. Your safe space must include Trump's bedroom where you suck his dick like he wants you to. Wake up, extremist.

I was more so referring to the broad shoulders and the adams apple, but whatever. And OUR President Donald J Trump does not want me to slob on his knob, i take that shit by force in the oval office. Im the Monica Lewinsky of the Trump era.
Eminem is a political whore like most of the Hollyweirds out in LaLa-Land. Isn't that right there, little Em?
Broad shoulders? Lol bitch where 😂 Making shit up now, alright, gotcha. And Richard you don't even have any pictures of yourself so you probably break mirrors dude. I know I'm not ugly, bye :p
